description.title: What is OpenFest...
description.text: OpenFest is the biggest Bulgarian conference dedicated to the free culture, free knowledge sharing, free and open-source software. The event is organized by volunteers and is free to attend. OpenFest is held annually in Sofia, Bulgaria.

cfp.title: How to participate in OpenFest 2024?
cfp.lecture: Take part with a lecture, a workshop or a booth
cfp.partners: Support the event as a partner

footer.description: OpenFest is a event dedicated to free culture, free and open-source software, and free sharing of knowledge.
footer.contactDirections: If you have any questions and suggestions or if you would like to participate in OpenFest 2024, get in touch with us:
